inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with high risk recurrent or refractory solid tumors following initial chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tumor must be sensitive to chemotherapy (maximum 8 cycles) and/or radiation defined as a greater than 50% reduction in size of the primary and/or metastatic sites.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of at least 8 weeks and performance status (Karnofsky or Lansky score) of at least 70%
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: acceptable candidates for peripheral blood stem cell transplantation based on their pre-transplant evaluation
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: central nervous system tumors are not eligible for this protocol
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: significant functional deficits in major organs which would interfere with successful outcome following PBSCT
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: active CNS disease or marrow involvement with the tumor at the time of transplant
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: disease progression after tandem PBSC #1 will not be eligible for tandem PBSC #2
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: women of childbearing potential who are currently pregnant (HCG+) or who are not practicing adequate contraception
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Richter's transformation, which may be a contraindication for this trial.
